intent_atoms.description: Integrate ResearchLogMonitor audit results into SwiftUI previews that render VR-006 research log entries.
The integration of ResearchLogMonitor audit results must be visible in SwiftUI previews rendering VR-006 research log entries.
ResearchLogMonitor audit results should always be available for preview rendering.
Use SwiftUI previews to display VR-006 research log entries with integrated audit data.
